name: reviews
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool axesso_otto_data_service.
Tool description: Our Otto Data Service API provides real-time data about product details, keyword search result and reviews from the german online shop Otto.de.
API description: Fetches product reviews from the Otto data service using the provided parameters.

productid.description: The ID of the product to look up reviews for.

sortby.description: The criteria to sort the reviews by. Defaults to 'newest'.
